artist: Artist: Louis Marcoussis; Publisher: Editions Fourcade, Paris
creditline: Gift of Mary and Robyn Campbell
description: abstracted image; four glowing circles at R, connected with a black line; geometric shapes at L; receding, fence-like element at center

portfolio: From Plate 8 from Ten Etchings for Aurélia (10 Eaux-fortes pour Aurélia) by Gérard de Nerval
provenance: Mary and Robyn Campbell, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2003.
signed: LRQ, bottom edge, in the plate: [M]
title: Several Moons
